summary: Hungarian is a language spoken mainly in Hungary and some nearby countries. It's one of the official languages of the European Union. People also speak Hungarian in parts of Slovakia, Ukraine, Romania, Serbia, Croatia, Slovenia, and Austria. Many people who moved from Hungary (known as the Hungarian diaspora) around the world, especially in North America and Israel, also speak it. With around 14 million speakers, Hungarian is the most widely spoken language in the Uralic language family.
title: Hungarian language
